784030.name: Squad Z
784030.description:
Squad Z is a post-apocalyptic game of survival. Players from around the world battle in an immersive, breathtaking experience of diverse maps and game modes.

Planned Key Features for the Full-Release Build


  • Maps
Multiple battle maps range from small, close quarter maps to large, long-range maps.

  • Game Modes
Several game modes include squad-based, survival, solo, and fast-paced modes.

  • Customization
Over 80+ styles to get your soldier ready for battle.

  • Community
Open community engagement between the developers and players. Your feedback is appreciated.

Current Key Features for the Early Access Build


  • Two Maps
  • Free-For-All Survival Game Mode
  • Practice Game Mode
  • Private Matches
